summary: a darkblue scheme with shimmering colors
name: Nightshimmer
description:
A calm, soothing color scheme for silent nights and other moments of magic. It reminds me a little of Monkey Island, or Sandman. Or something.

Here's a screenshot: https://github.com/niklasl/vimheap/wiki/images/nightshimmer.png

Enjoy!
install_details: Simply drop this into your "$HOME/.vim/colors/" and use ":colorscheme nightshimmer". (Or just ":source" it.)

versions.release_notes: Long overdue: generic improvements and highlights of new groups (for folds etc.).
